name: Contrario
long_description: Contrario helps companies hire top engineers faster by identifying and screening high-quality candidates. Their platform leverages proprietary AI to identify job seekers from an elite talent pool (Stanford, MIT, Palantir, OpenAI, etc.) who match your hiring needs. Their voice agents conduct customized interviews that evaluate your candidates’ abilities to use AI in real-world coding challenges. With Contrario, your company only interviews pre-vetted engineers that will 10x your company’s growth.
one_liner: Contrario: AI to source and screen 10x engineers
